title: Xiaomi continues work on new tablet and foldable features in MIUI
content:
Xiaomi’s custom Android skin — MIUI — already offers several useful features for large-screen devices. As Ben noted in his review of the Xiaomi Pad 5, MIUI on the tablet offers a host of handy features, like the ability to open multiple apps in floating windows, split-screen view support, a home screen dock, and more.

The post Xiaomi continues work on new tablet and foldable features in MIUI appeared first on XDA.
description: The latest MIUI 13 beta for China includes a couple of new features for tablets and foldable devices. Read on to learn more.
